scripts.build: npm rum build:types && node ./scripts/build.mjs && cp package.json dist/package.json && (cd dist && npm pack)
scripts.perma-pub: npm run build && packajs pubjs -t Type=perma-package -t Title=u-leaderboard -t Description="A leaderboard for U!" -t Read-Me=https://github.com/facts-laboratory/ui-kit-js/blob/main/packages/fact-note/README.md -t Repository=https://github.com/facts-laboratory/ui-kit-js/tree/main/packages/fact-note -t Render-With=jkPpggGUW-ofqKKYzG4Al8luFwNURoqXkpLFjqmiS58 -w ${PATH_TO_WALLET}
